AI Description: GeneMarkS-2 is a gene prediction software that utilizes a self-training algorithm to predict genes in prokaryotic genomes. It identifies protein-coding genes, ribosomal RNA genes, and tRNA genes based on hidden Markov models.
Core Features: Gene Prediction In Prokaryotic Genomes, Self-Training Algorithm, Identification Of Protein-Coding Genes, Ribosomal RNA Genes, & Trna Genes, Utilizes Hidden Markov Models
General Tags: Gene Prediction, Prokaryotic Genomes, Hidden Markov Models
